gw.api.contact

Class ContactAutoSyncUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.contact.ContactAutoSyncUtilBase
      • gw.api.contact.ContactAutoSyncUtil
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class ContactAutoSyncUtil
extends ContactAutoSyncUtilBase
    A utility class for all Contact Auto Sync functions. The actual implementation for the auto sync functionality should be here so that gosu API can call into here.
    Author:
    ptam

    • Method Detail

      • autoSyncContact

        @Deprecated
public static void autoSyncContact(java.lang.String addressBookUID)
        Deprecated. 
        If the local contacts are marked allow auto-sync, this function syncs them up with the remote Address Book.
        Parameters:
        addressBookUID - - the address book uid for remote contact that has been modified

      • autoSyncContact

        @Deprecated
public static void autoSyncContact(java.lang.String addressBookUID,
                              java.lang.String newAddressBookUID)
        Deprecated. 
        If the local contacts linked to the AddressBook Contact with an ABUID of addressBookUID are marked allow auto-sync, this function syncs them up with the contact which has an ABUID of newAddressBookUID in the remote Address Book.
        Parameters:
        addressBookUID - - the address book uid for remote contact that has been modified
        newAddressBookUID - - the address book uid for the remote contact the local contact should sync to

      • autoSyncContact

      • createAutoSyncWorkItem

        @Deprecated
public static void createAutoSyncWorkItem(java.lang.String addressBookUID)
        Deprecated. 
        Create an contact auto sync work item for this given addressBookUID. If the system config param "InstantaneousContactAutoSync" is set to true, then the ContactAutoSync worker is notified as well.
        Parameters:
        addressBookUID - - Address book uid for the contacts need to re-sync

      • createAutoSyncWorkItem

        @Deprecated
public static void createAutoSyncWorkItem(java.lang.String addressBookUID,
                                     java.lang.String newAddressBookUID)
        Deprecated. 
        Create an contact auto sync work item for this given addressBookUID. If the system config param "InstantaneousContactAutoSync" is set to true, then the ContactAutoSync worker is notified as well. If a newAddressBookUID is specified, the addressBookUID of those contacts will be replaced by newAddressBookUID.
        Parameters:
        addressBookUID -
        newAddressBookUID -
